newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan central bank injects T$11.75 bln in funds.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan central bank injects T$11.75 bln in funds.

text.p: Taiwan's central bank on Tuesday injected T$11.75 billion worth of funds into the banking system through open market operations, a central bank official said.
The bank, through bills finance companies, bought T$11.75 billion in approved securities instruments offered by financial institutions with yields of between 5.50 and 5.85 percent, the official said.
The institutions have the option of repurchasing the instruments between eight and 15 days from now, the official said.
